ExportItemConfig.Query: SELECT c.id, c.`partner_id`, c.`code`, c.`description`, c.`amount`, c.`total_amount`, c.`fee`, c.`discount`, c.`integral`, c.`min_level`, c.`min_fee`, begin_time, over_time, c.`allow_enable`, c.`need_bind`, lv.name as limit_levelName FROM pm_coupon c LEFT JOIN pt_member_level lv ON c.min_level = lv.value WHERE c.partner_id={partnerId} AND lv.partner_id={partnerId} AND code LIKE '%{keyword}%' ORDER BY c.update_time DESC,c.create_time desc LIMIT {page_start},{page_size}
ExportItemConfig.Total: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM pm_coupon c LEFT JOIN pt_member_level lv ON c.min_level = lv.value WHERE c.partner_id={partnerId} AND lv.partner_id={partnerId} AND code LIKE '%{keyword}%'
